summary: Royalties on the sale of oil and gas produced on federal lands bring in significant federal revenue. The Interior Department has 7 years to verify payment accuracy. At the same time, companies that over- or underpay have up to 6 years to revise their royalty reports. Overpayments can be applied to future royalties or refunded. title: Oil and Gas Royalties: Congress and Interior Should Strengthen Safeguards to Better Ensure Accurate Payments
